text: Create a note by pressing the big blue + button. All your notes will appear in the creatively named "All" tab. In this demo version of the app, the notes are saved to your browser's local storage.
The UI is designed to be used on mobile, not desktop, and it's meant to feel like a messaging app. Your most recent notes are at the bottom, and you scroll up to see older ones.

The Inbox tab is where you review and process notes. There are only 2 actions you can take on a note:

Keep: The note is removed from the inbox for today, but it'll keep coming back on future days. At first frequently, but then less and less so as time goes on.

Archive: The note is removed from the inbox forever. You'll still see it in the "All" tab, but it'll never come up in the inbox again.

Head over to the Inbox tab to try it out.
